quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Your task for today is to pick-up the passkey from the floor of the restroom.
commands: unlock rectangular passageway with rectangular keycard
unlock formless portal with formless key
unlock type P passageway with type P key
unlock rectangular passageway with rectangular keycard
unlock formless portal with formless key
unlock type P passageway with type P key

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You are in a spare room. A normal one. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a counter. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the counter. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] formless portal leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a basement. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer close by.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The coffer is empty![end if] You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a table. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the table.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
I never took you for the sort of person who would show up in a bedchamber, but I guess I was wrong. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You can make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box in the corner.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The box contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] rectangular passageway leading east. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] formless portal leading west. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a laundromat.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a shower, cool, but is it normal? You better believe it is. You can barely contain your excitement.

 Look over there! a rack. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a rack, go to TextWorld. The rack is typical.[if there is something on the s_2] On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You are in an office. An usual kind of place.



There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a parlor.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a portmanteau.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_3]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The portmanteau is empty![end if] You see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] dresser right there by you.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_4], so there's that.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The dresser is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You arrive in a recreation zone. A normal one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a recliner. [if there is something on the s_3]On the recliner you make out [a list of things on the s_3]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty.[end if] You make out a bench. [if there is something on the s_4]On the bench you can see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if] You can make out a couch. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! The couch is typical.[if there is something on the s_5] On the couch you can make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a steam room. An ordinary kind of place.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] type P passageway leading south. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a restroom.

 Were you looking for a drawer? Because look over there, it's a drawer.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] What a letdown! The drawer is empty![end if] You see a board. The board is usual.[if there is something on the s_6] On the board you can see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] However, the board, like an empty board, has nothing on it. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a garage. Let's see what's in here.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] type P passageway leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a cellar. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can see a chest.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can make out a workbench. The workbench is standard.[if there is something on the s_7] On the workbench you make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] However, the workbench, like an empty workbench, has nothing on it.[end if] You make out a stand. [if there is something on the s_8]On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_8]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]However, the stand, like an empty stand, has nothing on it.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a laundry place. A typical kind of place. You begin looking for stuff.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a pantry. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
Of every playroom you could have shown up in, you had to walk into a standard one.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a mantelpiece. [if there is something on the s_9]On the mantelpiece you can make out [a list of things on the s_9], so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] rectangular passageway leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a washroom.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You are in a vault. An ordinary one. You can barely contain your excitement.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You are in a study. An ordinary kind of place. You begin looking for stuff.

 You can see [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] case in the room.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The case contains [a list of things in the c_8]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The case is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just fallen into an attic.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a closet. Let's see what's in here.

 You can make out a shelf. [if there is something on the s_10]You see [a list of things on the s_10] on the shelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: formless portal
infos.desc: The formless portal looks solid. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: it is what it is, a rectangular passageway [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: it is what it is, a portal [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]
